S06bsu049_u:403: subhūtirāha - tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:404: tatkathamāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
S06bsu049_u:405: śāriputra āha - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:406: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi //
S06bsu049_u:407: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:410: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
S06bsu049_u:411: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:412: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ?
S06bsu049_u:413: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:415: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:417: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:420: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:422: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?
S06bsu049_u:426: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:427: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:428: iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:429: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:430: tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:434: akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā /
S06bsu049_u:446: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:449: rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:452: atha katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:457: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:458: evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā?
S06bsu049_u:459: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:460: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat - yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:465: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:466: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā /
S06bsu049_u:467: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:472: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho 'saṃnāhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:474: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (Vaidya 12)
S06bsu049_u:482: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam /
S06bsu049_u:484: yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi - kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:498: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti /
S06bsu049_u:503: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati?
S06bsu049_u:504: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:505: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāyānaṃ mahāyānamiti bhagavannucyate /
S06bsu049_u:508: evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:509: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:513: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:518: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:523: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate /
S06bsu049_u:524: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam /
S06bsu049_u:528: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:540: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:543: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme 'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06bsu049_u:557: na cānyatra bhagavan anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā upalabhyante,
S06bsu049_u:559: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:560: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:561: evaṃ veditavyam - caratyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:566: yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,
S06bsu049_u:571: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:577: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:583: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:584: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:590: evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti,
S06bsu049_u:594: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:600: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:606: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:607: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:613: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:615: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati?
S06bsu049_u:616: yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum?
S06bsu049_u:617_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra
S06bsu049_u:617_1: icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06bsu049_u:619: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum /
S06bsu049_u:621: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:622: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
S06bsu049_u:623: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:624: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:625: evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:626: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā - mayaite sarvasattvā na parityaktavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:628: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo 'pi chidyamāneneti /
S06bsu049_u:629: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:632: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:633: evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
S06bsu049_u:638: yadapyāyuṣman śāriputra evamāha - anutpādo bodhisattvo iti /
S06bsu049_u:641: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:643: subhūtirāha - bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:650: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte sarvajñatādharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:653: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte pṛthagjana evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:656: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:662: nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:663: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi,
S06bsu049_u:666: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
S06bsu049_u:667: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate?
S06bsu049_u:668: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:670: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo 'nutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:672: āha - utpādo dharmo 'nutpādo dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:673: āha - anutpādo 'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:678: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:680: tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
S06bsu049_u:684: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:691: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:695: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam,
S06bsu049_u:699: veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti // (Vaidya 16)
S06bsu049_u:700: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:702: yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:704: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:706: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:708: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:711: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:713: artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:721: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti //
S06bsu049_u:726: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt catvāriṃśatā trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:727: catvāraś ca lokapālā viṃśatyā cāturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:729: pañca ca śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:732_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - imānyārya
S06bsu049_u:732_1: subhūte saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi asyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni āryasya
S06bsu049_u:736: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena /
S06bsu049_u:740: na te bhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:743: abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:747: viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ //
S06bsu049_u:748: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:751: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kṛtajñairasmābhirbhagavan bhagavato bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:753: paurvakāṇāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike 'smadarthe bhagavān yathā brahmacaryaṃ bodhāya caran pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva san,
S06bsu049_u:756: evaṃ bhagavan asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca,
S06bsu049_u:759: asmābhir api hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītā anuparivāritāśca,
S06bsu049_u:761: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - tena hi kauśika śṛṇu,
S06bsu049_u:762: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu049_u:763: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:764: śūnyatāyāṃ kauśika tiṣṭhatā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:768: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:835: srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:837: sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:838: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:840: arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:842: pratyekabuddho 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:845_3: buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena
S06bsu049_u:846_0: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - yadi buddho 'tikramya pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya
S06bsu049_u:846_4: buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati
S06bsu049_u:849_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S06bsu049_u:849_1: āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato
S06bsu049_u:850: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:853: sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:854: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evameva āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:855: evaṃ śikṣitavyam - yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:861: yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito 'sthānayogeneti evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:862: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti //
S06bsu049_u:863: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt - yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni,
S06bsu049_u:865: na punaridaṃ vijñāyate yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:866_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:866_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - na vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:869: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt - uttānīkariṣyati bata ayamāryasubhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:874: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punar api teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate (Vaidya 20)
S06bsu049_u:875: sma - tena hi devaputrāḥ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:885: atha khalu punar api teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - kiṃrūpā asya āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:886_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
S06bsu049_u:886_1: tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - māyānirmitasadṛśā hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:888: tathā hi te naiva śroṣyanti na ca sākṣātkariṣyanti //
S06bsu049_u:889: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - kiṃ punarārya subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā?
S06bsu049_u:890: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat - māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:892: iti hi māyā ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,
S06bsu049_u:893: iti hi svapnaś ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:899: arhann api arhattvam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam /
S06bsu049_u:904: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - samyaksaṃbuddho 'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:906: subhūtirāha - nirvāṇam api devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:908: te devaputrā āhuḥ - nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
S06bsu049_u:909: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:911: iti hi devaputrā māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:912: iti hi svapnaś ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram //
S06bsu049_u:918_0: anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayante
S06bsu049_u:918_1: sma - ke 'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti?
S06bsu049_u:919: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān sthavirānetadavocat - te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā (Vaidya 21)
S06bsu049_u:923: ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti //
S06bsu049_u:924: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat - nāsyā āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:926: tathā hi - atra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate,
S06bsu049_u:932: tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:933: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - asya dharmaparyāyasya āryeṇa subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āryaṃ subhūtimabhyavakireyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:934: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat /
S06bsu049_u:935: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt - na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:941: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:945: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi - anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:949: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:954: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametadārya subhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:955: evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:956: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:958: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphale śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:971: evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:974: yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:975: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:976: yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:977: sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya /
S06bsu049_u:978: (Vaidya 22) evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:985: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:987: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:989: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:991: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:993: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:995: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:996: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:998: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:1002: evaṃ cāyuṣman śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:1004: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:1005: śāriputra āha - prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:1006: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra anubhāvo veditavyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:1008: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:1009: tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate /
S06bsu049_u:1010: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kasyaiṣo 'nubhāvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:1011: kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate iti?
S06bsu049_u:1014: yad api kauśika evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyeti?
S06bsu049_u:1015: prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:1016: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:1021: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:1024: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāpāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1035: rūpamahattayā hi kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1057: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:1058: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:1060: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1062: na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:1065: rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:1067: vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:1068: anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
S06bsu049_u:1071: na hi sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:1073: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu049_u:1074: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā //
S06bsu049_u:1075: śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta (Vaidya 24)
S06bsu049_u:1077: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti?
S06bsu049_u:1078: śakra āha - naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:1082: anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:1083: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā?
S06bsu049_u:1085: subhūtirāha - yatra kauśika na kācitsattvaparidīpanā kṛtā,
S06bsu049_u:1087: sacetkauśika tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nantavijñaptighoṣeṇa gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān api vitiṣṭhamānaḥ sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:1088: api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:1089: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
S06bsu049_u:1093: subhūtirāha - anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:1094: evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā //
S06bsu049_u:1095: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma - aho dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:1099: sa āryeṇa subhūtinā sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate /
S06bsu049_u:1100: tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa dhārayiṣyāmo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:1101: yo 'pi ca anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:1102: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:1103: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvam,
S06bsu049_u:1104_0: tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:1104_1: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato
S06bsu049_u:1104_3: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
S06bsu049_u:1105: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:1107: yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti //
S06bsu049_u:1112: atha khalu bhagavān ye tatra devaputrāḥ parṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan,
S06bsu049_u:1114: tān devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:1115: tāś ca sarvāścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:1116: kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān ābhāsvarāṃś ca parīttaśubhāṃś ca akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:1117_0: śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān mahābrahmapramukhāṃś ca brahmakāyikān
S06bsu049_u:1117_1: devaputrānābhāsvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yo hi kaściddevaputrāḥ kulaputro
S06bsu049_u:1117_2: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:1118: na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprekṣiṇyo 'vatāragaveṣiṇyo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:1119: nāpi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:1120: nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:1121: punaraparaṃ devaputrāḥ ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:1122: yaiś ca devaputrairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā na pravartitā,
S06bsu049_u:1123: te devaputrāstaṃ kulaputra vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:1124: tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasyāntikācchroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:1125: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:1126_0: na ca khalu punardevaputrāstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato
S06bsu049_u:1126_1: dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasya araṇyagatasya vā vṛkṣamūlagatasya
S06bsu049_u:1126_2: vā śūnyāgāragatasya vā abhyavakāśagatasya vā pathi gatasya vā utpathagatasya vā aṭavīgatasya
S06bsu049_u:1126_3: vā mahāsamudragatasya vā tatra tatropasaṃkrāmato vā caṃkramyamāṇasya vā sthitasya
S06bsu049_u:1126_4: vā niṣaṇṇasya vā vipannasya vā bhayaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,

S06bsu049_u:1129_1: dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yānatraye sattvān vinayati,

S06bsu049_u:2042: ebhir api bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet //
S06bsu049_u:2043: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ kauśika devaloka (Vaidya 50)
S06bsu049_u:2045: uta jāmbūdvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ tāni maṇiratnāni santi?
S06bsu049_u:2046: śakra āha - deveṣvāryānanda tāni maṇiratnāni santi /
S06bsu049_u:2047: api tu khalu punarjāmbudvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni santi /
S06bsu049_u:2048: tāni tu gurukāṇi alpāni parīttāni guṇavikalāni,
S06bsu049_u:2050: tatteṣāṃ divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti,
S06bsu049_u:2058: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamante nopayānti /
S06bsu049_u:2061: yatra ca karaṇḍake tanmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavati utkṣiptaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:2062: tata uddhṛte 'pi tasmin maṇiratne karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīya eva sa karaṇḍako bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:2064: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā ete guṇāḥ sarvajñajñānasya ca /
S06bsu049_u:2065: yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante - sarvajñajñānasyemāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanabhūtānyabhūvanniti /
S06bsu049_u:2066: yathā ca bhagavan sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā prajñāpāramitānirjātatvātpūjyā,
S06bsu049_u:2068: yathā ca bhagavan rājapuruṣo rājānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2069: evaṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmakāyānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2070: yathā ca dharmadeśanā dharmabhāṇakāś ca pūjāṃ labhante,
S06bsu049_u:2072: tasmāttarhi bhagavan tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2074: te 'pi sarve tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāścūlikābaddhā eko bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta,
S06bsu049_u:2075: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta /
S06bsu049_u:2076: tatra cenmāṃ bhagavan kaścideva pravārayedanyatareṇa bhāgena,
S06bsu049_u:2077: pravāryamāṇo 'nayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ - yaste bhāgo 'bhipretaḥ tamekaṃ bhāgaṃ parigṛhṇīṣveti,
S06bsu049_u:2078: tatra imāmevāhaṃ bhagavaṃstayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:2079: na khalu punarbhagavan mama teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /
S06bsu049_u:2081: api tu khalu punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitā sarvajñatā,
S06bsu049_u:2083: tasmāttarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā kṛtā bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:2084: punaraparaṃ bhagavan ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:2085: tān dharmatayā draṣṭukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06bsu049_u:2088: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:2089: ye 'pi te kauśika abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2090: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2091: (Vaidya 51) ye 'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2092: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S06bsu049_u:2093: ye 'pi te kauśika etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:2094: te 'pi kauśika buddhā bhagavantaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:2095: aham api kauśika etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:2096: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:2097: sarvasattvānāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaścittacaritāni samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:2099: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:2100: tena sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati //
S06bsu049_u:2101: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
S06bsu049_u:2102: bhagavānāha - sarvāsu kauśika ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati /
S06bsu049_u:2103: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva atra pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ vā dadataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2108: dharmān vā vipaśyataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitaivātra pūrvaṃgamā /
S06bsu049_u:2109: na ca kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ viśeṣaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2111: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jambudvīpe nānāvṛkṣā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā nānāpatrā nānāpuṣpā nānāphalā nānārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2112: na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06bsu049_u:2113: api tu chāyā chāyetyevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:2114: evameva kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2116: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:2123_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06bsu049_u:2128: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:2130: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca anugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:2131: evamimaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā evaṃmahārthikā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:2142: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ yo vā anyaḥ saṃpūjya parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajet,
S06bsu049_u:2144: katarastayorbhagavan kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet - yo vā parityāgabuddhiryo vā na parityāgabuddhiḥ?
S06bsu049_u:2145: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:2147: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śarīraṃ satkṛtya paricareddhārayet satkuryādgurukuryānmānayet pūjayedarcayedapacāyet svayameva /
S06bsu049_u:2148: yo vā anyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīraṃ svayaṃ ca satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:2150: dadyāt saṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:2151: katarastayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
S06bsu049_u:2152: kiṃ yaḥ svayaṃ ca pūjayet parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyāt saṃvibhajet,
S06bsu049_u:2153: kiṃ vā yaḥ svayameva pratyātmaṃ pūjayet?
S06bsu049_u:2154: śakra āha - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ ca tathāgataśarīraṃ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:2155: parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyātsaṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya,
S06bsu049_u:2156: ayamevānayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:2158: evametatkauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:2159: parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajedantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā /
S06bsu049_u:2161: kuladuhitrorvā parānugrahakaraḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parityāgabuddhistannidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:2162: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra bhājanībhūtāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā syuḥ asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2163: tatra tatra gatvā tebhyaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:2164: ayameva kauśika tataḥ kulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //

S06bsu049_u:2166: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
S06bsu049_u:2169: bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06bsu049_u:2170: yaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate,
S06bsu049_u:2173: prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya adhyāśayasaṃpanno 'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt,

S06bsu049_u:2984: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:2989: ye ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:2990: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣiṣyante 'dhimokṣayiṣyanti pratiṣṭhāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:2991: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākariṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2993: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākariṣyanti pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:2995: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:2998: ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3000: ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3002: ye ca sattvāsteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3004: tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:3005_0: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato
S06bsu049_u:3005_1: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:3008: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3009: sa yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ cittamiti,
S06bsu049_u:3010: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3011: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3012: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /

S06bsu049_u:3030: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,

S06bsu049_u:3077: yāvacca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ parinirvāsyanti parinirvānti ca,
S06bsu049_u:3078: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
S06bsu049_u:3079: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:3080: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3085: yaiś ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśito deśayiṣyate deśyate ca,
S06bsu049_u:3086: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3090: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:3092: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:3094: yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:3097: yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3098: yaiś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
S06bsu049_u:3100: yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ śroṣyate śrūyate ca,
S06bsu049_u:3102: yaiś ca sattvaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvṛteṣu parinirvāsyatsu parinirvāyatsu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3104: tāni sarvāṇyakato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodeta,
S06bsu049_u:3105: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
S06bsu049_u:3106: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
S06bsu049_u:3107: tasya kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:3108: sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati - te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3109: sa ca dharmo 'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ (Vaidya 76)
S06bsu049_u:3113: evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3115: tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate /
S06bsu049_u:3116: sacetpunarevaṃ saṃjānīte - na cittaṃ cittaṃ jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:3124: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - so 'pi puṇyābhisaṃskāro viviktaḥ śāntaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3125: yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tad api viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:3126: sacedevam api na saṃjānīte - sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti,
S06bsu049_u:3127: evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad api tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam /
S06bsu049_u:3129: yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tad api tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam /
S06bsu049_u:3133: na hi buddhā bhagavanto nimittayogena pariṇāmanāmabhyanujānanti /
S06bsu049_u:3137: yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3140: atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā,
S06bsu049_u:3144: evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:3145: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam - idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:3148_0: atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā
S06bsu049_u:3148_1: abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā
S06bsu049_u:3150: na hi prajñāpāramitāmanāgamya śakyeyamaśrutavatā prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmanākriyā praveṣṭum /
S06bsu049_u:3151: tatra ya evaṃ vadet - śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti,
S06bsu049_u:3157: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī upalambhamanupalambhe pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:3158: tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti /
S06bsu049_u:3162: yatsa parinirvāṇam api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca /
S06bsu049_u:3164: na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti /
S06bsu049_u:3167: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ saviṣaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:3168: kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataś ca gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:3169: api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ bhavati paṇḍitānām,
S06bsu049_u:3171: tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:3172: tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya varṇatasya gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3175: evameva ārya subhūte ihaike durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3176: evamanuśāsiṣyanti - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham /
S06bsu049_u:3177: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3178: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
S06bsu049_u:3179_0: etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca
S06bsu049_u:3179_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām,
S06bsu049_u:3180: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3181: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3182: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:3183: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3184: ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:3185: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:3186_0: yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:3186_1: bhagavatāṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā
S06bsu049_u:3186_2: niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:3187: evaṃ sa pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate,
S06bsu049_u:3197: kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06bsu049_u:3198: ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te (Vaidya 78)
S06bsu049_u:3199: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇam /
S06bsu049_u:3200: yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam,
S06bsu049_u:3201: yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:3203: evamanumodamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'naparāddho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3204: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S06bsu049_u:3206: evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ //
S06bsu049_u:3207_0: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam
S06bsu049_u:3207_1: - yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ
S06bsu049_u:3207_2: kāmadhātau aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
S06bsu049_u:3214: evaṃ pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3218: anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti,
S06bsu049_u:3219: yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti,
S06bsu049_u:3221: evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S06bsu049_u:3222: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:3228: asyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3229: tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate,
S06bsu049_u:3233: atra yaḥ puṇyaskandho yaś ca gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3234: tān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:3236: tato 'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajaḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra ākhyāyate,

S06bsu049_u:3680: ye kecidimāṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:3687: te svasaṃtānān saviṣān kṛtvā parasaṃtānān saviṣān kariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:3689: svayaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā anavabudhyamānāḥ parān api grāhayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3692: kutastaiḥ saha saṃvāsaṃ kuto vā lābhasatkāraṃ kutaḥ sthānam?
S06bsu049_u:3694: dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:3696: kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ kṛṣṇāhijātikāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3697: teṣāṃ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgālānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:3700: ime te śāriputra dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3701: śāriputra āha - na bhagavatā tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamākhyātam /
S06bsu049_u:3702: bhagavānāha - tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:3704: mā tathārūpasya pudgalasya tadātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rūdhiraṃ mukhādāgacchet,
S06bsu049_u:3711: maiva mahāpratibhayaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamaśrauṣīdyasyeme doṣāḥ saṃvidyante //
S06bsu049_u:3712: na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti - iyattasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:3713: dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:3714: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇīteti /
S06bsu049_u:3715: bhagavānāha - eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3716: yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:3718: vyākhyātā, eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā saṃvego bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3719: tataḥ sa tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ karmabhyo vinivṛtya puṇyābhisaṃskārameva kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:3720: jīvitahetor api saddharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyati - mā bhūdasmākam api tādṛśairduḥkhai samavadhānamiti //
S06bsu049_u:3721: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:3723: yatra hi nāma bhagavan evaṃrūpeṇa vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:3724: katamena punarbhagavan karmaṇā iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:3725: bhagavānāha - evaṃrūpeṇa subhūte vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:3726: ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:3727: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:3730: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca pratibādhitāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhabodhiḥ pratibādhitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3731: buddhabodhau pratibādhitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:3734: tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghe 'pi pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:3736: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate?
S06bsu049_u:3737: bhagavānāha - mārādhiṣṭhito vā subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3738: duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena vā karmaṇā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsya śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:3740: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate /
S06bsu049_u:3741: punaraparaṃ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pāpamitrahastagato vā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3744: ātmotkarṣī pareṣāṃ paṃsako doṣāntaraprekṣī vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:3745: ebhirapi subhūte caturbhirākāraiḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:3746: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate iti //
S06bsu049_u:3751: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena /
S06bsu049_u:3753_0: duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena
S06bsu049_u:3754: subhūtirāha - kiyadgambhīrā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duradhimocatayā?
S06bsu049_u:3782: paramaduradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
S06bsu049_u:3785: paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
S06bsu049_u:3791: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3792: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhī rupaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3797: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3798: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhirvijñānaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3799: punaraparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3801: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3808: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:3811: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3827: āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:3829: āha - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte?
S06bsu049_u:3830: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:3834: vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:3837: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan sarvajñatāyā nāpakāraṃ karoti,
S06bsu049_u:3840: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan na kaṃciddharmaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:3843: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ātmaviśuddhito bhagavan rūpaviśuddhiḥ?
S06bsu049_u:3858: āha - ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavan avabodhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:3861: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - sā khalu punariyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nāpare tīre,
S06bsu049_u:3865: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evam api bhagavan saṃjñāsyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñciṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:3870: nāmato 'pi hi subhūto saṅgo nimittato 'pi saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3871: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā supariniṣṭhitā,
S06bsu049_u:3872: yatra hi nāma bhagavatā ime 'pi saṅgā ākhyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3873: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:3877: atīteṣu dharmeṣvatītā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3878: anāgateṣu dharmeṣvanāgatā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3879: pratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3880: iyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūyate bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prathamena cittotpādeneti saṃjānīte, saṅgaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:3881: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:3882: subhūtirāha - sacetkauśika tadbodhicittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamiti,
S06bsu049_u:3884: na ca cittaprakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā mahāyānasaṃprasthitena /
S06bsu049_u:3885_0: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā
S06bsu049_u:3885_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ
S06bsu049_u:3887: buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā /
S06bsu049_u:3889: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:3891: tena hi subhūte anyān api sūkṣmatarān saṅgānākhyāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:3893: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S06bsu049_u:3896: bhagavānetadavocat - iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti /
S06bsu049_u:3901_0: iti hi so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ye anāsravā dharmāstānanumode
S06bsu049_u:3901_1: ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:3902: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06bsu049_u:3903: na sā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu049_u:3907: na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ nārambaṇīkartum /
S06bsu049_u:3921: tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3922: subhūtirāha - tasmāttarhi bhagavan sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena?
S06bsu049_u:3923: bhagavānāha - tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit /
S06bsu049_u:3936: evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti //
S06bsu049_u:3940: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:3942: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā /
S06bsu049_u:3945: āha - tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ caritavyam?
S06bsu049_u:3946: bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati,
S06bsu049_u:3948: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:3972: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadevaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sasaṅgatā ca asaṅgatā ca khyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:3973: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati,
S06bsu049_u:3980: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:3991: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:4003: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:4004: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:4011: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:4018: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:4023: asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:4024: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam //
S06bsu049_u:4031: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:4033: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:4036: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo bhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe nānunīyate na saṃkliśyate,
S06bsu049_u:4042: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate /
S06bsu049_u:4049: ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti /
S06bsu049_u:4051: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:4054: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate //
S06bsu049_u:4055: atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
S06bsu049_u:4056: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:4058: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya ārya subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate,
S06bsu049_u:4064: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ājñāpayatu bhagavān /
S06bsu049_u:4065: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati /
S06bsu049_u:4066: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi?
S06bsu049_u:4068: subhūtirāha - evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:4071: lapsyante 'sya avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo manuṣyāś ca amanuṣyāś ca avatāram /
S06bsu049_u:4072: api ca kauśika ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:4073: yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:4074: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum?
S06bsu049_u:4076: subhūtirāha - evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti /
S06bsu049_u:4080: te ca dharmā na vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati /
S06bsu049_u:4083: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:4088: (Vaidya 99) upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'tiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:4092: sahāpatiś ca mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasahasraṃ samānvāharanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:4093: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padairebhirevākṣaraiḥ subhūtināmadheyaireva bhikṣubhiriyameva prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭā,
S06bsu049_u:4095: tatrāpi śakrā eva devendrāḥ paripṛcchanti sma,
S06bsu049_u:4096: paripraśnayanti sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe iyameva prajñāpāramitā bhāṣitā /

S06bsu049_u:6392: atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakunestataḥ patataḥ ākāśe antarīkṣe sthitasya antarā cittasyaivaṃ bhavet - aho batāhaṃ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭheyamiti /

S06bsu049_u:6396: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet?
S06bsu049_u:6398: kṛtaś ca sa bhagavan upahataś ca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /

S06bsu049_u:6589: bhagavānāha - anuttarāyāṃ subhūte samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu samaṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:6599: sarvasattveṣu mātṛsaṃjñāmupasthāya pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ copasthāpya pare ālambitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:6600: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmantike sthātavyam,

S06bsu049_u:6607: tasyaivaṃ spṛhayata evaṃ śikṣamāṇasya anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ yāvaddharmasthitiranāvaraṇā bhaviṣyatīti //
S06bsu049_u:6612: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ke ākārāḥ,

S06bsu049_u:7018: imāny api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
S06bsu049_u:7023: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /

S06bsu049_u:7029: subhūtirāha - pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni nirdeṣṭum /
S06bsu049_u:7030: ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:7031: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7033: ānimittasya apraṇihitasya anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti //
S06bsu049_u:7034: subhūtirāha - eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇām?

S06bsu049_u:7061_1: yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati - evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam /

S06bsu049_u:7066: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ /

S06bsu049_u:7071: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran?

S06bsu049_u:7077: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran?
S06bsu049_u:7078: subhūtirāha - bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran /
S06bsu049_u:7079: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:7080: iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:7081: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7084: evaṃ hi subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ,

S06bsu049_u:7089: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,

S06bsu049_u:7117: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,

S06bsu049_u:7123: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati //
S06bsu049_u:7124: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā,

S06bsu049_u:7130: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7131: tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā /
S06bsu049_u:7132: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā,
S06bsu049_u:7134: subhūtirāha - aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,

S06bsu049_u:7151: (Vaidya 173) subhūtirāha - kiṃ śūnyatāyā eva bhagavan kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti,
S06bsu049_u:7154: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ityākhyātāḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7160: tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:7161: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ - aprameyamiti vā,
S06bsu049_u:7174: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā,
S06bsu049_u:7187: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7192: prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7193: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7194: kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:7196: na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /

S06bsu049_u:7199: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:7201: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:7202: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7204: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ śīlapāramitā vivardhate,

S06bsu049_u:7210: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate,

S06bsu049_u:7215: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ vīryapāramitā vivardhate,

S06bsu049_u:7225: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vivardhate,

S06bsu049_u:7228: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:7230: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kā punareṣā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06bsu049_u:7238: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
S06bsu049_u:7240: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇām api subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
S06bsu049_u:7241: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhirevaṃrūpairmanasikārairviharan āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti //
S06bsu049_u:7246: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:7250: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānāmupacayo bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:7251: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalato 'rciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā,

S06bsu049_u:7258: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sā vartirdagdhā?
S06bsu049_u:7261: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte na ca prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,

S06bsu049_u:7270: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:7271: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:7272: na ca nāma taiścittotpādairna cānyatra tebhyaścittotpādebhyo 'bhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:7274: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittaṃ niruddham,
S06bsu049_u:7292: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva,
S06bsu049_u:7295: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā nirotsyate?
S06bsu049_u:7297: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā?
S06bsu049_u:7298: āha - tathaiva bhagavan sthāsyati yathā tathatā /
S06bsu049_u:7299: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:7302: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte gambhīrā tathatā?
S06bsu049_u:7306: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte cittaṃ tathatā?
S06bsu049_u:7312: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre carati?
S06bsu049_u:7316: tathā hyasya te samudācārā na pravartante,
S06bsu049_u:7318: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:7321: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramārthe carati,
S06bsu049_u:7324: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tasya nimittamavibhāvitam?
S06bsu049_u:7326: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:7327: subhūtirāha - na sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prayujyate - kathamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:7333_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo
S06bsu049_u:7333_1: mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatastrīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati - śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:7338: avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaścokto bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:7339: sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:7340: tato 'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena bhavitavyam /

S06bsu049_u:7438: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - kutaste śāriputra etadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti?
S06bsu049_u:7439: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa samanvāgato 'rhanniti prabhāvyate?
S06bsu049_u:7441: bhagavānāha - evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,

S06bsu049_u:7465: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:7471: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena /
S06bsu049_u:7472: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sacenmama sattvāḥ sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni hareyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7476: teṣām api ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam /

S06bsu049_u:7484: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7486: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /

S06bsu049_u:7499: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7503: tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,

S06bsu049_u:7506: evaṃ cānena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ - tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye,

S06bsu049_u:7523: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyādhikāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7524: evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ cintayitavyaṃ tulayitavyam - neha sa kaściddharmo yo vyādhyā bādhyate,

S06bsu049_u:7532: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na duṣkarasaṃjñotpādayitavyā - bahvī dīrghā caiṣā apūrvā koṭiriti,
S06bsu049_u:7534: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7535: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhyaścānyebhyaś ca dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7536: jñātavyamidaṃ śāriputra bhavyo 'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhumiti /

S06bsu049_u:7543: tathā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parijayaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7544: yathā prajñāpāramitāpi me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti //

S06bsu049_u:7546_1: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan atra sthāne notrasiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:7549: anutrastā ca asaṃtrastā ca sarvasattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /

S06bsu049_u:7552: samanantaraṃ prāduṣkṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin smite atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavākiradabhiprākirat /
S06bsu049_u:7553: atha khalu tāni suvarṇapuṣpāṇyasaktāni antarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitānyabhūvan //
S06bsu049_u:7554_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06bsu049_u:7554_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
S06bsu049_u:7556: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
S06bsu049_u:7557_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - iyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate
S06bsu049_u:7557_1: 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
S06bsu049_u:7557_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:7560_0: seyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivartya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhya itaścyutvā
S06bsu049_u:7560_1: akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:7561: tatra copapannā akṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7562: tataścyutā satī buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena /
S06bsu049_u:7565: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda rājā cakravartīṃ prāsādātprāsādaṃ saṃkrāmet,
S06bsu049_u:7567: sa yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyāṃ bhūmitalaṃ pabhdyāmanākramya kālaṃ kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:7568: evameva ānanda iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginī buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati /
