S06bsu049_u:7570: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt - ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7572: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:7574: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7576: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:7578: tāvanto hyānanda tatra śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ nāsti pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:7579: api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:7580: tena khalu punarānanda kālena tena samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre na vyālakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7581: na caurakāntārāṇi na pānīyakāntārāṇi na vyādhikāntārāṇi na durbhikṣakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:7582: etāni cānyāni ca ānanda asātakāntārāṇi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7584_0: suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punarānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ
S06bsu049_u:7586: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā katamasya tathāgatasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06bsu049_u:7587: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - anayā ānanda gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya (Vaidya 182)
S06bsu049_u:7590: sa ca dīpaṃkarastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpairevāvakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā /
S06bsu049_u:7592: anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06bsu049_u:7593_0: tato 'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:7593_1: - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavaka anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06bsu049_u:7593_2: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
S06bsu049_u:7594: tadā etasyā bhaginyā mama vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi - aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7595: evaṃ ca ānanda etasyā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamabhūdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7596: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:7598: evam etat yathā vadasi - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti //
S06bsu049_u:7603: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃścaratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7605: bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti pratyavekṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:7608: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyamavikṣiptayā cittasaṃtatyā yathā pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpamiti tāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na samanupaśyet /
S06bsu049_u:7609: tāṃ ca asamanupaśyan dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkuryādbhūtakoṭim /
S06bsu049_u:7610: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā sākṣātkartavyeti /
S06bsu049_u:7611: kathaṃ bhagavan tasmin samādhau sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
S06bsu049_u:7612: bhagavānāha - yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7618: asamāhita evārambaṇe cittamupanibadhnāti - prajñāpāramitā ca me parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:7620: atrāntarā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣairdharmaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7623: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06bsu049_u:7624: tasmin samaye bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ānimittena ca samādhinā vihartavyam,
S06bsu049_u:7627: evamārūḍhakuśalamūladharmasamanvāgato hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - paripākasyāyaṃ kālaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7629: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
S06bsu049_u:7630: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ paramaśūraś ca bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7649: supariniṣpannatayā sarveṣveva ca śilpasthāneṣu paramagatiko bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7662: bahujanasya ca priyo manaāpaś ca bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:7667: tena mahālābhena samanvāgataḥ san bahujanaṃ saṃvibhajet,
S06bsu049_u:7672: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣastatonidānaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:7677_0: bhagavānāha - sa khalu punaḥ subhūte puruṣastayā mahāsaṃpattyā samanvāgato mātāpitṛputradārān
S06bsu049_u:7677_1: gṛhītvā kenacideva kāraṇasāmagrīyogena mahāṭavīkāntāraṃ pratipanno bhavet mahāpratibhayaṃ
S06bsu049_u:7678: sa tatra praviṣṭaḥ saṃstān mātāpitṛputradārānabhayenābhinimantrayet - mā bhaiṣṭa,
S06bsu049_u:7682: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte aṭavīkāntāre tasya puruṣasya bahavaḥ pratyarthikāḥ bahavaḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7683_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa śūraḥ puruṣastaiḥ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairabhyutthitairavinivartyo
S06bsu049_u:7687: ādhyātmikaś ca bāhyaś ca balavān saṃbhāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7688_0: tasya tatra aṭavīkāntāre bahutarakāś ca śūratarakarāś ca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarakarāś
S06bsu049_u:7688_1: ca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāmanye udāratarakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāstiṣṭhanti rakṣanti /
S06bsu049_u:7689: te tasya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:7690_1: ca tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārācchaktaḥ kṣemeṇa svastinā śīghramapakrāmayituṃ
S06bsu049_u:7690_2: yāvadgrāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā anuprāptaḥ syāt //
S06bsu049_u:7691_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06bsu049_u:7691_1: sarvasattvahitānukampī maitrīvihārī karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī upekṣāvihārī upāyakauśalyena
S06bsu049_u:7691_2: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ kuśalamūlāni samyagbuddhānujñātayā pariṇāmanayā pariṇāmya
S06bsu049_u:7695: tathā hyasya balavattamā dṛḍhatamāś ca parigrāhakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7698: tenaiṣa pratibalaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:7699: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike maitrīcittamārambaṇīkṛtya tān paramayā maitryā paribadhnāti,
S06bsu049_u:7700: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kleśapakṣaṃ mārapakṣaṃ cātikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya tatra samādhāvavatiṣṭhate /
S06bsu049_u:7701: aprāptaś ca sa subhūte āsravakṣayaṃ paramapāramitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:7702: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06bsu049_u:7703: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cedānīṃ nānimittena samādhinā viharati /
S06bsu049_u:7704: na cānena ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ sākṣātkṛto (Vaidya 185) bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:7705: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunirākāśe 'ntarīkṣe carati,
S06bsu049_u:7709: na ca tatrāpi niśrito na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7710: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāvihāreṇa viharati,
S06bsu049_u:7716: na ca śūnyatāyāṃ vā ānimitte vā apraṇihite vā patatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7717: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavāniṣvastrācārya iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ supariniṣṭhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7719: ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍaistatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patat pratinivārayet,
S06bsu049_u:7721: tasya paurvakasya kāṇḍasya kāṇḍaparaṃparayā bhūmau patanaṃ na dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:7723: yāvannākāṅkṣet - aho batedaṃ kāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patediti /
S06bsu049_u:7724: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ tāvattāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:7725: yāvanna tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni suparipakvāni /
S06bsu049_u:7726: yadā tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni bhavanti suparipakvāni,
S06bsu049_u:7728: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evameteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gambhīradharmatā pratyavekṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā,
S06bsu049_u:7730: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7738: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:7740: paramaduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:7745: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7746: tasyeme evaṃrūpāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣā bhavanti - mayaite sarvasattvāḥ parimocayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:7747: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittamabhinirharati - sarvasattvā mamāparityaktāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7752: tadā upāyakauśalyasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - nāyamantarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7755: sa caivāsya cittotpādo yattasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7756: sa evamanena cittotpādenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti //
S06bsu049_u:7757: punaraparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:7758: pratyavekṣitukāmo vā bhavati - tadyathā śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukham,
S06bsu049_u:7761: tenaivaṃ cittamabhinirhartavyam - dīrgharātramamī sattvāḥ sattvasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7769: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena cittotpādena anena copāyakauśalyena samanvāgato nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:7770: na ca parihīyate maitrīsamādhito na karuṇāmuditopekṣāsamādhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7772: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śuklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7775: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā dharmasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7777: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:7781: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7784: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nimittasaṃjñayā nimitte caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7785: teṣāṃ nimittasaṃjñāprahāṇāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:7786: sa ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7787: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:7789: na ca parihīyate maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ sarvasamādhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7791: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7794: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nityasaṃjñayā sukhasaṃjñayā ātmasaṃjñayā śubhasaṃjñayā ca viparyastāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7795_0: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya nityasaṃjñāyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ
S06bsu049_u:7795_1: ātmasaṃjñāyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā viparyāsasya prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi - anityametatsarvaṃ na nityamiti /
S06bsu049_u:7799: so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti (Vaidya 187)
S06bsu049_u:7803: na ca parihīyate maitrīto vā karuṇāto vā muditāto vā upekṣāto vā /
S06bsu049_u:7805: upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7808: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ cittotpādamutpādayati,

S06bsu049_u:7810: nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7811: viparyāse caritāvinaḥ etarhy api viparyāse caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7812: piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7813: abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7814: mithyādṛṣṭau caritāvinaḥ etarhy api mithyādṛṣṭau caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7815: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaiṣāmete doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:7818_0: evaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena smṛtisamanvāhāreṇa anena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ
S06bsu049_u:7818_1: upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ evameteṣāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ
S06bsu049_u:7818_2: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śūnyatāto vā ānimittato vā apraṇihitato vā anabhisaṃskārato
S06bsu049_u:7818_3: vā anutpādato vā ajātito vā abhāvato vā /

S06bsu049_u:7825: yāni cittānyabhinirharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śūnyatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:7833: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākaroti - śūnyataiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:7834: ānimittameva apraṇihitameva anabhisaṃskāra eva anutpāda eva ajātireva abhāva eva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavya iti /
S06bsu049_u:7837: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /

S06bsu049_u:7849: bhavet? bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte sa paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:7850: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā aśrutvā va evaṃ pratipadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:7851: evaṃ visarjayet - avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7852: subhūtirāha - tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhāya caranti /
S06bsu049_u:7854: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:7857: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā uttaptāvaropitakuśalamūlā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:7858: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /

S06bsu049_u:7942_0: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhāṣiṣyate - yena satyena satyavacanena

S06bsu049_u:8008: niyatastaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /

S06bsu049_u:8095_1: yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni?

S06bsu049_u:8509: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati //
S06bsu049_u:8510: atha khalvanyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - abhibhūto 'si kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8511: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8512: evamukte śakro devānāmindrastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat - ekacittotpādenaiva ahamārya tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā abhibhūtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8513: kaḥ punarvādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8514: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati (Vaidya 204)
S06bsu049_u:8516: kaḥ punarvādo ye śrutvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:8519: te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8520: na kevalaṃ te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8522: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8523: na kevalaṃ srotaāpannān sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8524: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahādānapatayaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8525: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8526: na kevalaṃ tān mahādānapatīn bodhisattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8527_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā pariśuddhaśīlā akhaṇḍena śīlaskandhenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa
S06bsu049_u:8527_1: paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8528: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8529: na kevalamakhaṇḍenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8530: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣāntisaṃpannā upaśamasaṃpannā apratihatacittā antato dagdhasthūṇāyāmapyāghātacittaṃ notpādayanti prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8531: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8533: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ārabdhavīryā anikṣiptadhurā akusīdā anavalīnakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8534: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8536: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānārāmā dhyānaratā dhyānabalino dhyānabalavanto dhyānapratiṣṭhitā dhyānavaśinaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8537: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8538: yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ sarvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānanupāyakuśalāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8541: yo hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:8543: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8545: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno nacirādgamiṣyati bodhimaṇḍam /
S06bsu049_u:8546: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sattvān kleśapaṅke saṃsīdamānānuddhariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8547: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8550: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ (Vaidya 205)
S06bsu049_u:8551: catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣasva,
S06bsu049_u:8553: imāni te catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena pratigrahītavyānīti /
S06bsu049_u:8554: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kevalaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:8557: tathāgatair api so 'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairnityameva samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8558: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni kānicillaukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāṇi vā anyāni vā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:8559: tānyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ notpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:8560: ayam api bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:8561: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhavat - kimayaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ svakena pratibhānena bhāṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8563: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - buddhānubhāvo 'yamāryānanda veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8567: evam etat yathā śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:8575: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8578: tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8579: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti - kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
S06bsu049_u:8581: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati /
S06bsu049_u:8582: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:8585: tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti,
S06bsu049_u:8588: digdāhānupadarśayanti - apyeva nāma ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:8590: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8593: ānanda āha - kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:8594: bhagavānāha - yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8595: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8597: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8600: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8602: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8604: sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti,
S06bsu049_u:8607: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8609: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saddharmaparigrāhakamālīno bhavati - eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8611: bahavo 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mamānye 'pi sahāyakāḥ santi /
S06bsu049_u:8613: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8615: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8617: (Vaidya 207) punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet - gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:8619: na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:8623: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8625: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyān bodhisattvānavamanyate - ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8628: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8632: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8633: evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo 'vamanyate /
S06bsu049_u:8634: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:8635: ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8636: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:8639: parān paṃsayati - na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:8641: tatra mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmevaṃ bhavati - na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8643: mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāś ca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:8645: yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:8648: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:8653: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:8654: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06bsu049_u:8659: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati //
S06bsu049_u:8660: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:8662: samaye mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati - dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām,
S06bsu049_u:8663_0: atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nyena bodhisattvayānikena
S06bsu049_u:8663_1: pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:8664: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8666: evaṃ cāsya bhavati - ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti //
S06bsu049_u:8667: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto 'vyākṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet,
S06bsu049_u:8669: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8671: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam,
S06bsu049_u:8672: utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ?
S06bsu049_u:8673: bhagavānāha - saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām /
S06bsu049_u:8674: tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:8679: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8680: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:8682: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati - yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8687: so 'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe,
S06bsu049_u:8688: paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:8691: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8696: yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api śrotavyaṃ manye /
S06bsu049_u:8702: na ca mayā svaparāddheṣv api pareṣu vyāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8706: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8710: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānām api pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:8713: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam?
S06bsu049_u:8715: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8728: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8734: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06bsu049_u:8735: bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8737: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau /
S06bsu049_u:8740: subhūtirāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:8741: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?
S06bsu049_u:8742: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:8743: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti?
S06bsu049_u:8744: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:8750: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:8751: api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā?
S06bsu049_u:8753: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:8756: bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8757: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:8764: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati /
S06bsu049_u:8765: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum /
S06bsu049_u:8767: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati /
S06bsu049_u:8768: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati /

S06bsu049_u:8777: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate /

S06bsu049_u:8787: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8796: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8818: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8829: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8834: asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /

S06bsu049_u:8840: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:8844: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8845: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:8849: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:8852: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
S06bsu049_u:8854: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto 'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti,
S06bsu049_u:8859: vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
S06bsu049_u:8860: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti,
S06bsu049_u:8863: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti /
S06bsu049_u:8865: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye 'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ,

S06bsu049_u:8903: tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatamebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8905: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete 'lpatamebhyo 'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8906: teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:8908: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8916: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,

S06bsu049_u:8921: evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti /

S06bsu049_u:8924: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8925: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve 'kuśalā dharmā niruddhā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8926: sarvāś ca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:8927: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8928: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8931: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8933: subhūtirāha - jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:8934: kaḥ punarvādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8935: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte eko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiścopatiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:8936: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06bsu049_u:8939: bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:8942: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā /
S06bsu049_u:8943_0: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06bsu049_u:8944_2: lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:8945: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:8947: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattir api tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:8948: bhagavānāha - śrāvakasaṃpattir api subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:8949: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:8955: na ca prativahati - mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:8956: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:8957: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8959: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,
S06bsu049_u:8961: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8965: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:8968: atha tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:8970: evam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:8978: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:8979: kaḥ punarvādo yadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:8984: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante //
S06bsu049_u:8985: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,
S06bsu049_u:8986: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam - anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe,
S06bsu049_u:8987: abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:8994: yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:8995: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:8997: iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:8999: tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9000: ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ sattvāṃstārayema,
S06bsu049_u:9005: yasteṣāṃ bhagavan prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittotpādānanumodate,
S06bsu049_u:9008: kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06bsu049_u:9009: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:9010: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:9011: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:9012: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:9013: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:9014: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:9016: dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:9017: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:9018: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:9019: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum //
S06bsu049_u:9020: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9021: ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti,
S06bsu049_u:9027: mārabhavanebhyaś ca te bhagavan sattvāścyutā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9030: mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9039: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika, evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:9044: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:9049: yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:9059: na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti [NOTE:
S06bsu049_u:9060: Conze translates “nor hear any unpleasant sounds“] /
S06bsu049_u:9061: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9062: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:9063: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9067_1: sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yair api bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9074: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9075_0: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ
S06bsu049_u:9075_1: tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:9077: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:9078: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam?
S06bsu049_u:9080: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām?
S06bsu049_u:9082: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:9083: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi,
S06bsu049_u:9084: tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:9086: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9088: so 'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā?
S06bsu049_u:9090: na so 'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti /
S06bsu049_u:9094: na hi bhagavan asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:9099: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
S06bsu049_u:9103: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:9104: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:9112: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:9118: tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9123: taṃ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā //
S06bsu049_u:9127: tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:9130: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:9137: āsannā me 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:9139: dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivam api na bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:9141: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati - kasyacidahamāsannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9145: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:9146: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9149: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro mamāsannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9150: yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9153: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:9154: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9157: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati - yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne,
S06bsu049_u:9158: ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9161: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:9162: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:9165: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,
S06bsu049_u:9168: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:9173: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9174: na tasyaivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:9178: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:9182: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9187: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:9192: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:9198: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:9207: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:9209: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:9211: atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat - namaskartavyāste sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9216: anenāpi paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9219_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtisteṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva
S06bsu049_u:9219_1: cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tāni saṃbahulāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyāmantrayante
S06bsu049_u:9219_2: sma - nedaṃ devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaram,
S06bsu049_u:9221: idaṃ tu devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva paramaduṣkaraṃ caiva,
S06bsu049_u:9222: yadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyānapramāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante /
S06bsu049_u:9223: te ca sattvā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:9227: evaṃ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sattvān vineṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:9228: ākāśaṃ sa devaputrā vinetavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinetavyān manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:9231: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9233: ākāśena na sa devaputrāḥ sārdhaṃ veditavyaṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:9234: yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:9235: ayaṃ ca saṃnāho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9239: sacedatraivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:9247: evaṃ devaputrāḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:9250: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati?
S06bsu049_u:9253: anena bhagavan kāranena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:9261: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne nirdiśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:9271: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9272: bhagavānāha - na kevalaṃ subhūte evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9273_0: ye 'pi te subhūte brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā
S06bsu049_u:9273_1: apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā
S06bsu049_u:9273_2: bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9274: te 'pi subhūte taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evaṃ carantaṃ namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9275: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9276: te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmevaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9277: te ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamanugṛhṇanti,
S06bsu049_u:9279: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanugṛhyante samanvāhriyante,
S06bsu049_u:9280: te te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9281: na ca teṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante mārato vā anyato vā /
S06bsu049_u:9285: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:9286: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9287: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9288: yāvanta subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9290: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte,
S06bsu049_u:9291: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9292: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9295: sarvadharmāś ca anena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:9296: (Vaidya 222) ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9297: aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9301: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:9302: evaṃ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:9306: utsāhaṃ cāsya vardhayiṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
S06bsu049_u:9307: tasmāttarhi kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:9309: etenaiva hi tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharan anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:9319: evaṃ te devaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:9321: etena hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye te 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9322_0: te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharatastasya
S06bsu049_u:9322_1: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatasya yaduta prajñāpāramitāviharaṇaguṇaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9323: buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9325: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ahametarhi ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06bsu049_u:9326: śikhino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9327: udānaṃ codānayāmi apareṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu049_u:9328: ya etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:9329: evameva subhūte te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto ye etarhi iha mama buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9331: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9333: subhūtirāha - kiṃ sarveṣāmeva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9336: na subhūte sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ (Vaidya 223)
S06bsu049_u:9338: kiṃ tarhi subhūte ye te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṅgavigatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9339: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9341: subhūtirāha - santi bhagavan avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā tato 'nye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9342: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9344: bhagavānāha - santi subhūte pratipakṣabalino bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:9345: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9348: ye etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9350_0: ime te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06bsu049_u:9350_1: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9352: ye 'pi te subhūte ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9354_0: ime 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06bsu049_u:9354_1: sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ
S06bsu049_u:9356: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvadharmā anutpattikā ityadhimuñcanti,
S06bsu049_u:9360: anenāpi subhūte vihāreṇa viharatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9362: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9368_0: yeṣāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ te buddhā
S06bsu049_u:9368_1: bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ na rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:9371: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9375: evametadyathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitamityadhimucya vistareṇa śroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:9377: imāṃ vayaṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādvistareṇa śṛṇuyāmeti,
S06bsu049_u:9378: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye cāsya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:9380: te 'pyenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimucyamānā yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitā tathā cādhimokṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:9382: evaṃ subhūte bahukaraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇam api vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:9386: tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadya tiṣṭhanti tathatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:9387: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhantaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti //
S06bsu049_u:9388: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavaṃstathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:9389: tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sthāsyati tathatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:9392: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - yadā tathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:9408: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:9412: na ca nāma bhagavan kaściddharmastathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:9418: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:9419: yeṣāmevaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:9421: sarvadharmeṣu kauśika śūnyeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatā vā bhavati dhandhāyitatā vā bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:9425: tadyathāpi nāma antarīkṣe iṣuḥ kṣipto naiva kvacitsajjati,
S06bsu049_u:9427: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kaccidahaṃ bhagavan subhūtiṃ sthaviramārabhya evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavāmi dharmavādī ca,
S06bsu049_u:9430: tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣase - evametatkauśika, evam etat /

S06bsu049_u:9870: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā - sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /

S06bsu049_u:10082: evaṃ cāśrauṣīt - śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ca tvayā kulaputra sarvadharmeṣvadhimuktimutpādya prajñāpāramitā paryeṣṭavyā /
S06bsu049_u:10083: nimittaparivarjitena bhāvaparivarjitena sattvadṛṣṭiparivarjitena ca tvayā bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:10085: kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca tvayā sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:10086: yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādājātāniruddhābhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10087: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra pratipadyamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi pustakagatāṃ vā dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ kāyagatām /
S06bsu049_u:10088: yasya ca tvaṃ kulaputra antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāḥ śāstṛsaṃjñā tvayā tatrotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:10089: kṛtajñena ca tvayā bhavitavyaṃ kṛtavedinā ca - eṣa mama kalyāṇamitraṃ yasyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantikācchṛṇomi /
S06bsu049_u:10096: imāstvayā kulaputra anuśaṃsāḥ paritulayamānena dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:10097: na ca tvayā kulaputra lokāmiṣapratisaṃyuktayā cittasaṃtatyā dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10098: dharmārthikena ca tvayā dharmagauraveṇa dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10100: asti hi kulaputra māraḥ pāpīyān dharmabhāṇakasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpaśabdagandharasasparśānupasaṃharati sevituṃ bhaktuṃ paryupāsitum /
S06bsu049_u:10102: tatra ca tvayā kulaputra dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau nāprasādacittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:10103: api tvevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - nāhaṃ tadupāyakauśalyaṃ jāne,
S06bsu049_u:10105: eṣa sattvavinayena sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaparigrahamupādāya enān dharmān pratisevate bhajate paryupāste /
S06bsu049_u:10106: na hi kvacidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgo vā ārambaṇaṃ vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:10107: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca tvayā kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10112: sarvadharmā hi niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10113: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmabhāṇakamanubadhnan nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāsyasi /
S06bsu049_u:10114: aparam api tvaṃ kulaputra mārakarma samanvāhareḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10117: tatra tvayā kulaputra na prativāṇiḥ kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:10118: api tu dharmārthikenaiva dharmagauraveṇaiva anirviṇṇamānasena dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ //
S06bsu049_u:10119: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya nirghoṣasyāntikādimāmanuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhya yena pūrvā dik tena pratikrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:10120: aciraprakrāntasya cāsyaitadabhūt - na mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:10122: tatra rudan krandan śocan paridevamānaḥ evaṃ cintayati sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe ekaṃ vā rātriṃdivamatināmayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:10138: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ ekaputrake kālagate mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgato 'bhavat,
S06bsu049_u:10141: evameva subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasmin (Vaidya 240)
S06bsu049_u:10143: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmīti //
S06bsu049_u:10144: atha khalu subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathotkaṇṭhitasya tathāgatavigrahaḥ purataḥ sthitvā sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:10146: evaṃ hi kulaputra paurvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā,
S06bsu049_u:10148: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vīryeṇa etenaivotsāhenaṃ etayaivārthikatayā etayaiva cchandikatayā anubadhya pūrvāmeva diśaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:10149: asti kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairgandhavatī nāma nagarī saptaratnamayī,
S06bsu049_u:10154_0: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthiśatairālekhyavicitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhā
S06bsu049_u:10155: samantataḥ prākārāś ca tasyā nagaryāḥ saptaratnamayāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10156: teṣāṃ ca saptaratnamayānāṃ prākārāṇāṃ jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya khoḍakaśīrṣāṇi pramāṇavantyupodgatāni /
S06bsu049_u:10157: sarvasmiṃś ca khoḍakaśīrṣe saptaratnamayo vṛkṣo jāto nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān /
S06bsu049_u:10158: sarvataś ca khoḍakavṛkṣādratnamayaṃ sūtraṃ dvitīyaṃ khoḍakavṛkṣāntaramavasaktam /
S06bsu049_u:10159: sarvāvatī ca sā nagarī sauvarṇena kiṅkiṇījālena praticchannā /
S06bsu049_u:10160: tasya ca kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteneritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:10161: tadyathāpi nāma pañcāṅgikasya tūryasya sametya saṃgītyāṃ kuśalairgandharvaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:10162: evameva tasya kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:10163: tena ca śabdena te sattvāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10164: samantācca tasyā nagaryāḥ parikhā vāriparipūrṇā anusārivārivāhinyo vāriṇo nātiśītasya nātyuṣṇasya pūrṇāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10165: tasmiṃś ca vāriṇi nāvaḥ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ vicitrā darśanīyāsteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākenābhinirvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10166: yāsu te sattvā abhiruhya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10168: anyaiś ca abhijātābhijātaiḥ sugandhagandhibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃchāditam /
S06bsu049_u:10169: nāsti sā kācittrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpajātiryā tatra nāsti /
S06bsu049_u:10174: sarvāsu tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu saptaratnamayāni vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi jātāni,
S06bsu049_u:10176: sarvāṇi ca tānyutpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāni śakaṭacakrapramāṇapariṇāhāni sugandhāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni,
S06bsu049_u:10183: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatāṃ buddhanetrīcitrīkārānugatasugataśrutacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ dīrgharātraṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktānām /
S06bsu049_u:10184: tatra ca kulaputra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ madhyeśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhaṃ yojanaṃ samantāt /
S06bsu049_u:10189: aśokaṃ ca nāma śokavigataṃ ca nāma puṣpacitraṃ ca nāmodyānam /
S06bsu049_u:10190: ekaikasmiṃścodyāne 'ṣṭāvaṣṭau puṣkariṇyo yaduta bhadrā ca nāma,
S06bsu049_u:10198: tāsāṃ ca khalu puṣkariṇīnāmekaṃ pārśvaṃ sauvarṇamayaṃ dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ rūpyamayaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sphaṭikamayam /
S06bsu049_u:10201: ekaikasyāṃ ca puṣkariṇyāmaṣṭāvaṣṭau sopānāni nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ sopānaphalakaiḥ pratimaṇḍitāni /
S06bsu049_u:10202: sarvasmiṃś ca sopānaphalakavivarāntare jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya kadalīvṛkṣo jātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10204: samantācca tāsāṃ puṣkariṇīnāṃ nānācitrāḥ puṣpavṛkṣā jātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10205: teṣāṃ puṣpavṛkṣāṇāṃ vāteneritāni puṣpāṇi puṣkariṇīṣu patanti /
S06bsu049_u:10206: sarvāsu ca tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu candanagandhikaṃ vāri,
S06bsu049_u:10208: tatra ca dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saparivāro 'ṣṭaṣaṣṭayā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati / ye 'pi
S06bsu049_u:10211: te 'pi sarve nityapramuditā udyāneṣu puṣkariṇīṣu ca pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10212: sa khalu punardharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa tāvatkālaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati,
S06bsu049_u:10214: ye 'pi te sattvāstatra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ vāstavyāḥ te 'pi madhyenagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya āsanaṃ prajñapayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10215: suvarṇapādakaṃ vā rūpyapādakaṃ vā vaiḍūryapādakaṃ vā sphaṭikapādakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:10220: upariṣṭāccāntarīkṣe cailavitānaṃ muktāvicitritaṃ samaṃ sahitā niratāḥ kimayaṃ saṃsthita iti susaṃsthitavicitravipākatayā dhārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10221: samantācca taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ pañcavarṇikaiḥ kusumairabhyavakiranti saṃpravikiranti /
S06bsu049_u:10223: yathāpīdaṃ dharmāśayaviśuddhyā tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmagauraveṇa ca /
S06bsu049_u:10224: tatra dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣaṇṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayati /
S06bsu049_u:10226: śraddheyaśraddadhānatayā śraddhotpādanena te sattvā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:10227: tatra ca bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:10232: sarvaṃ ca te sattvā avinipātadharmāṇo 'vinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10233: tasya tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:10235: sa hi tava kulaputra dīrgharātraṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃdarśakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10238: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhitamanasikāramutpādayamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi //
S06bsu049_u:10239: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10240: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ saviṣeṇa śalyena viddho nānyaṃ manasikāramutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:10241: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ śalyahartāraṃ vaidyaṃ lapsye yo mamedaṃ śalyamuddhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:10243: evameva sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye nānyaṃ kaṃciddharmaṃ manasi karoti,
S06bsu049_u:10244: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ taṃ kulaputraṃ drakṣyāmi yo māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrāvayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:10245: yanmama dharmaṃ śrutvā upalambhamanasikārāḥ prahāsyanta iti //
S06bsu049_u:10246: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe sthitaḥ tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇoti sma /
S06bsu049_u:10312: sa eṣu samādhiṣu sthitaḥ san daśadiśi loke buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ prakāśayato bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10313: te ca tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadati sma,
S06bsu049_u:10315: evaṃ cāvocan - asmābhir api kulaputra pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevameva prajñāpāramitā parigaveṣitā /
S06bsu049_u:10316: parigaveṣamāṇaiś ca ete eva samādhayaḥ pratilabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10318: enāṃś ca samādhīn pratilabhya gatiṃgatāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10320: te vayameteṣāmeva samādhīnāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ vyavalokayantastaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmo yaḥ samāpadyate vā vyuttiṣṭhate vā,
S06bsu049_u:10331: sarvabuddhadharmaguṇapāramitā ca anuprāptā yasyā guṇapāramitāyā na śakyaṃ tathāgataireva tāvatpramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ paryanto vā nidarśayitum,
S06bsu049_u:10333: tasmāttarhi kulaputra eteṣveva tvayā dharmeṣu gauravamutpādayitavyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā arthikatayā chandikatayā ca /
S06bsu049_u:10334: arthikasya hi kulaputra chandikasya ca na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10335: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravamutpādayitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:10338: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣiprameva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
S06bsu049_u:10339: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃstathāgatānetadavocat - ko 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitramiti?
S06bsu049_u:10340: ta enametadavocan - dīrgharātraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ parigṛhītaś ca /
S06bsu049_u:10342: sa tava kulaputra parigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10343: tattvayā kṛtajñatayā kṛtaveditayā ca satkṛtya tatkṛtaṃ dhārayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:10345: mahāsattvamekaṃ vā kalpaṃ dvau vā kalpau trīn vā kalpān kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā uttare cailoṇḍukamiva śirasā parikarṣeḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10349: evam api tvayā kulaputra tasya kulaputrasya naiva kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:10351: tasya hi kulaputra kulaputrasya anubhāvena tavaiṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ pratilambhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10353: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samāśvāsya antarhitā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:10358: tasyaitadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ mama saṃparigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10360: yannvahametamarthaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhigamyopasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10361: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti //
S06bsu049_u:10362: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve prema ca prasādaṃ ca citrīkāraṃ ca gauravaṃ ca upasthāpayati /
S06bsu049_u:10363: upasthāpya evaṃ prācintayat - kiyadrūpayā nu khalvahaṃ satkriyayā taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam?
S06bsu049_u:10365_0: na ca me kiṃcittathārūpaṃ vastraṃ vā ratnaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā maṇayo vā muktā vā vaidūryaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10365_1: vā śaṅkhaśilā vā pravālaṃ vā rajataṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpo vā gandho vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10365_2: vā cūrṇaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭā vā patākā vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:10366: kenāhaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryām?
S06bsu049_u:10370: na ca me prītirvā prāmodhaṃ votpadyate //
S06bsu049_u:10371: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpairguṇairgauravamanasikārairgacchan anupūrveṇa anyataraṃ nagaramanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10372: tatra tasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya etadabhūt - yannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya tena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām /
S06bsu049_u:10373: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vikrītāni /
S06bsu049_u:10374: punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre aparimāṇāni ca nirayaduḥkhāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:10375: na punarevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā sattvānāṃ satkārāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:10376: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvontarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdamanuśrāvayāmāsa,
S06bsu049_u:10380_0: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhūt - ayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06bsu049_u:10380_1: dharmakāmatayā yadyātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ
S06bsu049_u:10381: prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca pariprakṣyati - kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpatsyate iti,
S06bsu049_u:10383: adhṛṣyaś ca bhaviṣyati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ,
