S06bsu049_u:10582: tasya ca kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10584: yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā vilīnena vaidūryeṇa /
S06bsu049_u:10586: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ taṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīdaparimāṇena pūjāvyūhena pratimaṇḍitam /
S06bsu049_u:10588: śakraṃ ca devānāmindraṃ divyairmāndāravapuṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇaistaṃ kūṭāgāramavakirantamabhyavakirantamabhiprakirantam /
S06bsu049_u:10590_0: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat
S06bsu049_u:10590_1: - kimarthaṃ tvaṃ devendra anekairdevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhamidaṃ ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ
S06bsu049_u:10591: imāni ca divyāni vādyāni devairuparyantarīkṣe pravāditāni?
S06bsu049_u:10592: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvaṃ kulaputra jānīṣe?
S06bsu049_u:10593: eṣā hi sā prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā,
S06bsu049_u:10594: yatra śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaguṇapāramitānugatān sarvabuddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca kṣipramanuprāpnuvantīti /
S06bsu049_u:10595: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kvāsau kauśika prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:10597_0: śakra āha - eṣā kulaputra asya kūṭāgārasya madhye suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu vilīnena vaidūryeṇa
S06bsu049_u:10597_1: likhitvā āryeṇa dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptabhirmudrābhirmudrayitvā sthāpitā /
S06bsu049_u:10599: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhai pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ samagrībhūtaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10600: yānyanena puṣpāṇi gṛhītāni mālyadāmāni ca vastraratnāni ca dhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:10602: anyatarānyataraṃ ca tataḥ pratyaṃśaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ yaduta dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkārāya //
S06bsu049_u:10603_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:10603_2: ca puṣpairdivyaiś ca vādyaiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvaṃ pūjayitvā yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo
S06bsu049_u:10604: divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravādayati sma dharmapūjāmevopādāya //
S06bsu049_u:10605: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopariṣṭānmūrdhni puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ prātiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:10606: tāni ca nānāvarṇāni puṣpāṇi suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi (Vaidya 251)
S06bsu049_u:10608: tāny api cīvarāṇi vastraratnāni ca antarīkṣe nānāratnamayo 'bhramaṇḍapa iva saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10609: adrākṣītkhalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyedamevaṃrūpamṛddhiprātihāryam /
S06bsu049_u:10610: dṛṣṭvā ca punareṣāmetadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvanmaharddhikaścāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvanmahānubhāvo yāvanmahaujaskaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10613_0: atha khalu tāni śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamāni pañca dārikāśatāni dharmodgate bodhisattve
S06bsu049_u:10613_1: mahāsattve spṛhāmutpādya sarvāstāḥ samagrībhūtā adhyāśayena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06bsu049_u:10614: evaṃ cāvocan - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:10615: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca vayaṃ carantya eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06bsu049_u:10616: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lābhī /
S06bsu049_u:10618: yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkaroti gurukaroti /
S06bsu049_u:10619: bahujanasya ca saṃprakāśayema yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprakāśayati /
S06bsu049_u:10620: evameva ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgatā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:10621: pariniṣpadyemahi ca yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ pariniṣpannaś ca //
S06bsu049_u:10622_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca
S06bsu049_u:10622_1: dārikāśatāni prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitvā dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkṛtya
S06bsu049_u:10622_2: dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sagauravāḥ
S06bsu049_u:10623_0: ekānte sthitaś ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10623_1: mahāsattvametadavocat - ihāhaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ gaveṣamāṇo 'raṇyagato nirghoṣamaśrauṣam
S06bsu049_u:10625: so 'haṃ samyak taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yena pūrvā dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10626: tasya me etadabhūt - samyak ca mayā nirghoṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10627: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:10628: kasya vā antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmi lapsye veti /
S06bsu049_u:10630: so 'haṃ tena daurmanasyena mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritapanaṃ cāpanno 'bhūvam /
S06bsu049_u:10633: api tu prajñāpāramitāmeva manasi karomi - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:10635: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ iti /
S06bsu049_u:10637: sa māmevamāha - gaccha kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairanupūrveṇa gandhavatī nāma nagarī /
S06bsu049_u:10638: tatra drakṣyasi dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantaṃ prakāśayantamiti /
S06bsu049_u:10640: so 'haṃ tenaiva mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭastataḥ pṛthivīpradeśānna calitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10642: tasya me śṛṇvato bahūni samādhimukhāni prādurbhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:10643: (Vaidya 252) tatra sthitaṃ māṃ daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samāśvāsayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10644: sādhukāraṃ ca dadati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:10647: te māṃ tathāgatāḥ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya antarhitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10649: tasya me etadabhūt - kuto nu te tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10650: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
S06bsu049_u:10651: tasya ca me etadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinākṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10654: yataste tathāgatā āgatā yatra vā te tathāgatā gatā iti /
S06bsu049_u:10655: so 'haṃ tasya tathāgatavigrahasya nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ yena pūrvāṃ dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10659: so 'haṃ tvāṃ kulaputra pṛcchāmi - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10661: deśaya me kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:10662: yathā vayaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca jānīma,
S06bsu049_u:10668: evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti vā gacchanti vā /
S06bsu049_u:10672: na hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:10675: na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10678: na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10681: na hi kulaputra yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10684: na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10687: na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10690: na hi kulaputra ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:10693: na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10694: yā ca kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:10702: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse 'bhigate madhyāhnakālasamaye marīcikāṃ paśyet syandamānām /
S06bsu049_u:10703: sa tena tena pradhāvet - atrodakaṃ pāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:10705: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:10706: pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā?
S06bsu049_u:10707: sadāprarudita āha - na hi kulaputra marīcikāyāmudakaṃ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:10708: kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate?
S06bsu049_u:10709: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:10712: evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10713: te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10714: ye ca tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10715: sarve te bālajātīyā duṣprajñajātīyā iti vaktavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10716: tadyathāpi nāma sa eva puruṣo yo 'nudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:10720: na ca kulaputra dharmatā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:10721: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:10722: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:10723: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:10724: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragata ekaṃ vā tathāgataṃ paśyet,
S06bsu049_u:10725: dvau vā trīn vā caturo vā pañca vā ṣaḍvā sapta vā aṣṭau vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:10727: sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekam api tathāgataṃ na paśyet /
S06bsu049_u:10728: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti?
S06bsu049_u:10729: sadāprarudita āha - na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne kasyaciddharmasya (Vaidya 254)
S06bsu049_u:10732: dharmodgata āha - evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā uktā bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:10733: ye kecitkulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmāṃstathāgatena nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:10734: te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā rūpakāyena vā abhiniviśya tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10735: yathāpi nāma dharmatāmaprajānanto ye ca tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10741: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmān svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti tathāgatena deśitān yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:10742: na te kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10744: ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:10748: na te tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:10752: te ca bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjate /
S06bsu049_u:10754: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudre ratnāni na pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:10758: na vidigbhyo nādhastānnopariṣṭānna kutaściddeśebhyo digbhya āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:10759: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:10762: nirudhyamānāni ca tāni ratnāni ca kvaciddaśadiśi loke saṃkrāmanti /
S06bsu049_u:10763: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ tāni ratnāni prabhāvyante,
S06bsu049_u:10764: teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:10765: evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna kutaściddaśadiśi lokādāgatā,
S06bsu049_u:10767: na ca ahetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10770: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ kāyābhiniṣpattirbhavati,
S06bsu049_u:10772: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
S06bsu049_u:10776_0: tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya tantrīś ca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca
S06bsu049_u:10776_1: pratītya upadhānīś ca pratītya koṇaṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya ca tajjavyāyāmaṃ pratītya
S06bsu049_u:10776_2: evamayaṃ vīṇāyāḥ śabdo niścarati hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10777: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:10778: na carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna puruṣasya tajjavyāyāmataḥ śabdo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:10779: api tu khalu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate /
S06bsu049_u:10781: evameva kulaputra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaniṣpattirhetvadhīnā pratyayādhīnā anekakuśalamūlaprayogapariniṣpannā ca /
S06bsu049_u:10782: na caikato hetuto na caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā /
S06bsu049_u:10786: evaṃ tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu049_u:10789: yataḥ kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃś ca sarvadharmāṃś ca anutpannānaniruddhāṃś ca saṃprajñāsyasi,
S06bsu049_u:10792: asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10793: sarvaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate,
S06bsu049_u:10799: sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni cābhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:10801: te sarve yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:10804: śakraś ca devānāmindraścatvāraś ca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran /
S06bsu049_u:10805: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:10806: tava kulaputra anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā sarvalokavipratyanīkā,
S06bsu049_u:10808: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10809: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya?
S06bsu049_u:10810_0: dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ
S06bsu049_u:10810_1: tava ca pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato 'ṣṭānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:10812: catuḥṣaṣṭeś ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni //
S06bsu049_u:10813: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato 'bhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:10814: yasya me prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10815: etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye /
S06bsu049_u:10816: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:10818_0: sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle
S06bsu049_u:10818_1: sthitvā evaṃ cintayati sma - kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ
